From: "Jason Rogers" <jason.rogers@...>

    > How do I write testcases for methods whose parameters are 
    > let's say 
    > BYTEArray or a Recordset ?

Make up your own ByteArray or RecordSet (or MockObject if it is complicated
enough), call your method, test your side effects.

This sounds obvious to me, so maybe I am missing something in your question.
Could you be more specific?

-Jason
subject: RE: [junit] Writing a testcase for methods which take non-primiti ve datatypes as parameters
